Name: Welcome Home
Ingredients: 60 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: "The history of Bacardí, simplicity and my guests were what inspired me to create Welcome Home. The Bacardi family survived a fire, prohibition, earthquakes and exile, and yet the brand is growing every year. The brand began in Cuba, and recent changes open the door to a 'welcome home.' The historical 'El Coco' is represented as coconut syrup; a hint of beetroot juice adds a little peatiness. Don Facundo Bacardi began with a simple shop; I have created a simple drink for my guests, which they could also make at home." We say : A beetroot daiquiri with a hint of toasted coconut.
History: Swiss BACARDÍ LEGACY 2016 winning cocktail by Christof Reichert, Dom "Grill Kitchen Bar" Karlsruhe.
Nutrition: One serving of Welcome Home contains 196 calories
